|  [InteractionChecker](./sdk-core.interactionchecker.md) | An interaction checker that aims to be as strict as possible. |  [TypeCardinality](./sdk-core.typecardinality.md) | <p>TODO: Simplify this class, keep only what is needed.</p><p>An abstraction for defining and operating with the cardinality of a (composite or simple) type.</p><p>Simple types (the ones that are directly encodable) have a fixed cardinality: \[lower = 1, upper = 1\]. Composite types (not directly encodable) do not follow this constraint. For example: - VarArgs: \[lower = 0, upper = \*\] - OptionalResult: \[lower = 0, upper = 1\]</p> |
